descriptions:
['DescriptionWelcome to Jubail Island. 
A thriving and diverse master planned community surrounded by the tranquility of nature. 
A stylish island oasis of unparalleled beauty; positioned against the backdrop of UAE’s thriving capital city, where amazing architecture will blend seamlessly with the diverse natural environment to provide an unrivaled quality of life that is a dream come true.
A true sense of belonging.
Sprawled across 4,000 hectares of mangrove forests and coastal estuaries with more than 30 km of waterfront, Jubail Island will be home to 6 distinct village communities, with deliberately bespoke, breathtakingly picturesque residential areas and community facilities.
The planning was guided by the following four principles - each a hallmark of successful towns around the world: 
Discovery and Connectivity
Wellness and Activity
Just outside Abu Dhabi - between Yas Island and Saadiyat Island – Jubail Island is a neighborhood unlike any other in the United Arab Emirates.
Located in a protected natural environment of stunning beauty, its surrounding ecosystem supports a diversity of wildlife.
Jubail Island is reality - a stunning refuge within a community waiting to be explored, just outside the vibrant inner city. Its breathtaking landscape plays an integral
part of the UAE’s rich and vital ecosystem.
Your journey into this sanctuary away from busy city life begins with a series of beautiful gateway experiences leading into a network of scenic drives, with views to the open water.']

descriptions:
['DescriptionSE7EN RESIDENCES re-branded as SEVEN PALM 
THE ULTIMATE INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY ON PALM JUMEIRAH
This project offers a 10% net ROI developer-backed guarantee for 5 years. 
A luxury hotel will be situated in the South tower of the Seven Palm project and the residences are located in the North tower. The towers are joined at the top by a stunning one-of-a-kind infinity pool and food and beverage outlets catering to the wants and needs of residents and visitors alike.
Nestled in between five-star DUKES The Palm and Oceana Residences on one side and Fairmont The Palm on the other. Walking distance to Nakheel Shopping Mall, Monorail stations, Al Itihad Park and Golden Mile Gallery.
Seven Palm offers breathtaking views of the Arabian Ocean, Marina skyline, the iconic Burj Al Arab and the Dubai Eye.
Studio apartments feature high quality furnishings maximizing space with flat screen televisions, fully equipped kitchens and floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light and spacious balconies with spectacular views. 
One bedroom apartments feature high quality furnishings, separate air-conditioning controls, flat screen televisions in the living and master bedroom, guest toilet, en-suite master bedroom, walk-in wardrobes, fully equipped kitchens and spacious balconies with spectacular views.
Amenities include an Olympic sized rooftop infinity swimming pool in length, fully equipped gymnasium, beach access, lush landscaped gardens and secure underground parking. There will also be a wide selection of dining options available.
The investment opportunity is available on select studio and one bedroom hotel apartments. 
The project is sold off-plan with completion due by Q4 – 2020 to all nationalities on a freehold ownership basis. 
For your exclusive viewing visit our sales office located at DUKES The Palm hotel or call us TODAY!']

For further details or to arrange a viewing appointment please contact our Head Office on +97144294444, alternatively visit our website www.allsoppandallsopp.com where you will find an extensive selection of properties.
Please call Jackson Downie on +971509352660 for more information.']

descriptions:
["DescriptionA High Return on Investment Opportunity 
Building Name: BINGHATTI STARS
Location: Silicon Oasis
Size: 515Sqft 
Starting Price:400,000/-Aed
ABOUT BINGHATTI STARS 
The dazzling Binghatti Stars building is sure to become one of Silicon Oasis' iconic towers. The modern theme of its eye-catching facade continues within, with cleverly designed architecture that makes the best use of space - for living, leisure and recreation. And speaking of recreation, the project definitely does not fall short. Younger residents will enjoy their very own play area, while adults can work up a sweat at the state-of-the-art gym, enjoy the heated swimming pool or simply relax in the jacuzzi after a long day. For even more options, residents are only Two minutes' walk away from Silicon Mall (opening in 2020), a premium retail and lifestyle destination that will house an array of attractive fashion, home and F&B brands, cinema, bowling centre and entertainment options for the entire family.
The apartments of Binghatti Stars vary from studio to two bedrooms, each with at least one secure, covered parking spot and of course, fixtures and finishes that personify the superior quality that Binghatti Developers stand for. 
 Permit No: 0916466066
